### Tender Notice for Switch Fuel Temperature and Filter

#### Title
Switch Fuel Temperature and Filter by Pass

#### Reference and Solicitation Numbers
Reference Number: `T8493-230017`
Solicitation Number: `T8493-230017/A`

#### Contract Details
The Crown is seeking a supplier to provide a switch fuel temperature and filter by pass for the Bell 429 aircraft, operated by Transport Canada.

#### Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN)
N1680 - Miscellaneous Aircraft Accessories and Components

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective tendering

#### Evaluation Criteria
The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Delivery Location
The switch fuel temperature and filter will be delivered to Newfoundland and Labrador.

#### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is Public Works and Government Services Canada.

#### Contracting Officer
Oliver Morones
Phone: (873) 455-5233
Email: oliver.morones@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### RFP Documents
The RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to the qualified supply arrangement holders who are invited to bid on this requirement.

#### Opportunities for Qualification
More suppliers may become qualified for the supply arrangement T8493-140035 Series by submitting a request to the supply arrangement authority.

#### Posting Date
The tender notice was posted on June 8, 2023.

#### Closing Date
The tender closed on June 7, 2023, at 13:00:00.

#### Language of Document
The documents may be submitted in either English or French.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Contract Award
The contract will be awarded to the bidder who submits the best overall proposal. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Note: The tender is open only to qualified supply arrangement holders for the procurement of T8493-140035 series. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:
